title: Mercedes-Benz E-Class LWB hits Indian market at Rs 78.5 lakh: Key features, engine specs, design and more
description: Mercedes-Benz has launched the 2024 E-Class Long Wheelbase (LWB) in India, priced from Rs 78.5 lakh (ex-showroom). The luxury sedan includes new design elements, advanced tech such as the MBUX Superscreen, and a refreshed engine lineup. Produced at Mercedesâ€™ Pune plant, it remains the only RHD LWB model built worldwide. Available in three variants, including the top-spec E 450 4MATIC, the 2024 model offers enhanced rear-seat comfort and safety features like adaptive cruise control and lane departure warning.
